VFSPtr vfs

Detailed Description

An OGRE Archive implementation that wraps a Mangle::VFS filesystem.

This has been built and tested against OGRE 1.6.2, and has been extended for OGRE 1.7. You might have to make your own modifications if you're working with newer (or older) versions.
